http://www.newscientist.com/article/mg20527=
441.500-horizontal-and-vertical-the-evolution-of-evolution.html?full=3Dtrue=

It talks essentially about the process that gave rise to the=
 evolutionary algorithm and protein synthesis machinery.

I wonder if you c=
ould use something like it to tweak or build an evolutionary algorithm?

at do you guys think?
